new_skill_specs.name: compute_length_of_segment_in_rhombus
new_skill_specs.purpose: Calculate the length of a segment connecting midpoints of two sides of a rhombus using given side and diagonal lengths.
new_skill_specs.outputs: Length of the segment connecting midpoints.
edge_cases: Ensure the inputs represent a valid rhombus.
Handle cases where the diagonal is longer than the side.
